short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting... and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submi ssion must be submitted on 2023-02-07 by 14:00 EST.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-02-07 by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison (Grn) Petawawa, has a requirement to procure mattresses and foundations in order to refurnish the accommodations buildings throughout Garrison Petawawa.
